languages.text: {n}Получив приказ от само{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, надзиратели — из страха ли, или из новообретенного мужества — пошли на прорыв и, понеся тяжелые потери, все же смогли вклиниться в ряды смутьянов. Вскоре культисты в полной мере ощутили на себе гнев людей, однажды уже вырвавших родной мир из когтей врагов Человечества.{/n}

{n}After receiving orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the overseers charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Получив приказ от само{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, надзиратели — из страха ли, или из новообретенного мужества — пошли на прорыв и, понеся тяжелые потери, все же смогли вклиниться в ряды смутьянов. Вскоре культисты в полной мере ощутили на себе гнев людей, однажды уже вырвавших родной мир из когтей врагов Человечества.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Having received orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the have charged — perhaps out of fear, or with the help of the newfound courage — and, suffering heavy losses, have managed to break into the ranks of the instigators. Soon, the cultists have felt the genuine anger of the people, who once clawed their home world out from the claws of the Archenemy.{/n}

{n}Having received orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the have charged — perhaps out of fear, or with the help of the newfound courage — and, suffering heavy losses, have managed to break into the ranks of the instigators. Soon, the cultists have felt the genuine anger of the people, who once clawed their home world out from the claws of the Archenemy.{/n}

The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

The people had once already ripped their home world from the claws of the Archenemy, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath topple over them.{/n}

The people had once already ripped their home world from the claws of the Archenemy, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath topple over them.{/n}

The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

{n}After receiving orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the overseers charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行星守卫收到了舰长大人的命令。也许是出于恐惧，由也许是突如其来的勇气，他们虽然蒙受了惨重伤亡，但还是成功击垮了叛军。人类将他们的家园从混沌大敌的魔爪中夺了回来。用不了多久，那些邪教徒就会发现无穷无尽的怒火朝他们扑来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having received orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the overseers charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break into the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their home world from the claws of the Archenemy, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath topple over them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行星守卫收到了舰长大人的命令。也许是出于恐惧，由也许是突如其来的勇气，他们虽然蒙受了惨重伤亡，但还是成功击垮了叛军。人类将他们的家园从混沌大敌的魔爪中夺了回来。用不了多久，那些邪教徒就会发现无穷无尽的怒火朝他们扑来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Habiendo recibido órdenes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, cargaron, quizá por miedo, quizá debido al valor recién descubierto, y, a pesar de sufrir grandes pérdidas, consiguieron abrirse paso entre las filas de los insurgentes. El pueblo ya había arrancado una vez su mundo natal de las garras del Archienemigo, y pronto los cultistas sentirían cómo su ira insaciable se desataba sobre ellos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having received orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, they charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break into the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their home world from the claws of the Archenemy, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath topple over them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Habiendo recibido órdenes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, cargaron, quizá por miedo, quizá debido al valor recién descubierto, y, a pesar de sufrir grandes pérdidas, consiguieron abrirse paso entre las filas de los insurgentes. El pueblo ya había arrancado una vez su mundo natal de las garras del Archienemigo, y pronto los cultistas sentirían cómo su ira insaciable se desataba sobre ellos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ロード・キャプテンから命令を受けた彼らは...恐れのためか、新たなに宿った勇気のためか分からないが...彼らは、大きな損害を被りながらも、なんとか反乱軍陣に侵入した。それらの者はかつて、渾沌の勢力の爪から自分たちの故郷の惑星を引き裂かれており、間もなく魔女団は、そのやり場のない怒りが自分たちに降り注ぐのを感じることになるだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having received orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, they charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break into the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their home world from the claws of the Archenemy, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath topple over them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・キャプテンから命令を受けた彼らは...恐れのためか、新たなに宿った勇気のためか分からないが...彼らは、大きな損害を被りながらも、なんとか反乱軍陣に侵入した。それらの者はかつて、渾沌の勢力の爪から自分たちの故郷の惑星を引き裂かれており、間もなく魔女団は、そのやり場のない怒りが自分たちに降り注ぐのを感じることになるだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir reçu les ordres {mf|du seigneur|de la seigneure}-capitaine, les gardiens chargent... par peur, sans doute, ou peut-être grâce à un nouvel élan de courage. Malgré de lourdes pertes, ils réussissent à briser les lignes rebelles. Bientôt, les fanatiques sentent la terrible colère de ceux qui ont réussi à reprendre leur monde des mains du Grand Ennemi...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having received orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, they charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break into the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their home world from the claws of the Archenemy, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath topple over them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir reçu les ordres {mf|du seigneur|de la seigneure}-capitaine, les gardiens chargent... par peur, sans doute, ou peut-être grâce à un nouvel élan de courage. Malgré de lourdes pertes, ils réussissent à briser les lignes rebelles. Bientôt, les fanatiques sentent la terrible colère de ceux qui ont réussi à reprendre leur monde des mains du Grand Ennemi...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem sie Befehle vom Lord Captain selbst erhalten hatten, stürmten sie los — vielleicht aus Angst, vielleicht aus einem neu gefundenen Mut. Obwohl sie schwere Verluste erlitten, gelang es ihnen, die Reihen der Aufständischen zu durchbrechen. Diese Leute hatten schon einmal ihre Heimatwelt den Klauen des Erzfeinds entrissen, und bald sollten die Kultisten spüren, wie ihr ungestillter Zorn über sie hinwegfegte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having received orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, they charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break into the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their home world from the claws of the Archenemy, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath topple over them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem sie Befehle vom Lord Captain selbst erhalten hatten, stürmten sie los — vielleicht aus Angst, vielleicht aus einem neu gefundenen Mut. Obwohl sie schwere Verluste erlitten, gelang es ihnen, die Reihen der Aufständischen zu durchbrechen. Diese Leute hatten schon einmal ihre Heimatwelt den Klauen des Erzfeinds entrissen, und bald sollten die Kultisten spüren, wie ihr ungestillter Zorn über sie hinwegfegte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lord Kaptan'ın bizzat verdiği emir, gözetmenleri ya korkutmuş ya da cesaretlendirmiş olacak ki hücuma geçtiler. Ağır kayıplar görmelerine karşın asilerin saflarını bozmayı başardılar. İnsanlar, evleri olan bu dünyayı daha evvel İnsanlığın düşmanlarının pençesinden bir defa kurtarmıştı zaten. Şimdiyse dinmemiş öfkeleri sel olup tarikatçılara çarpacaktı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After receiving orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the overseers charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lord Kaptan'ın bizzat verdiği emir, gözetmenleri ya korkutmuş ya da cesaretlendirmiş olacak ki hücuma geçtiler. Ağır kayıplar görmelerine karşın asilerin saflarını bozmayı başardılar. İnsanlar, evleri olan bu dünyayı daha evvel İnsanlığın düşmanlarının pençesinden bir defa kurtarmıştı zaten. Şimdiyse dinmemiş öfkeleri sel olup tarikatçılara çarpacaktı.{/n}
